member.name: T:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus
member.summary: Support class for GHI Electronics FEZCerberus for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.GetStorageDeviceVolumeNames
member.summary: Allows mainboards to support storage device mounting/umounting. This provides modules with a list of storage device volume names supported by the mainboard.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.MountStorageDevice(System.String)
member.summary: Functionality provided by mainboard to mount storage devices, given the volume name of the storage device (see ). This should result in a Microsoft.SPOT.IO.RemovableMedia.Insert event if successful.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.UnmountStorageDevice(System.String)
member.summary: Functionality provided by mainboard to ummount storage devices, given the volume name of the storage device (see ). This should result in a Microsoft.SPOT.IO.RemovableMedia.Eject event if successful.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.SetProgrammingMode(Gadgeteer.Mainboard.ProgrammingInterface)
member.summary: Changes the programming interafces to the one specified

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.SetLCDConfiguration(Gadgeteer.Mainboard.LCDConfiguration)
member.summary: This sets the LCD configuration. If the value GT.Mainboard.LCDConfiguration.HeadlessConfig (=null) is specified, no display support should be active. If a non-null value is specified but the property LCDControllerEnabled is false, the LCD controller should be disabled if present, though the Bitmap width/height for WPF should be modified to the Width and Height parameters. This must reboot if the LCD configuration changes require a reboot.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.SetLCDRotation(Gadgeteer.Modules.Module.DisplayModule.LCDRotation)
member.summary: Configures rotation in the LCD controller. This must reboot if performing the LCD rotation requires a reboot.
member.returns: true if the rotation is supported

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.SetDebugLED(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns the debug LED on or off
member.param: True if the debug LED should be on

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.PostInit
member.summary: This performs post-initialization tasks for the mainboard. It is called by Gadgeteer.Program.Run and does not need to be called manually.

member.name: P:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.MainboardName
member.summary: The mainboard name, which is printed at startup in the debug window

member.name: P:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerberus.MainboardVersion
member.summary: The mainboard version, which is printed at startup in the debug window
